text: as the Parliament starts its emergency
session here at the barricades the
situation is at its most peaceful for
the 10 days of the standoff a few
minutes ago a group of civic protestors
came very close to the police line they
were singing songs many people hope that
if the Parliament revokes the package of
laws which infuriated the protestors the
situation would be much comma but these
are just hopes at the moment elec baldry
